thread.title: BJP leader Naveen Patel manhandles woman corporator (Video)
thread.title_full: BJP leader Naveen Patel manhandles woman corporator (Video)

author: Nithya Nair
title: BJP leader Naveen Patel manhandles woman corporator (Video)
text:
BJP leader Naveen Patel manhandles woman corporator (Video) By Nithya Nair on October 21, 2015 at 5:08 PM Comments Oct 21: In yet another shocking incident of indecency towards women in the country, a Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader, Naveen Patel pushed a woman corporator, Simple Katela making her fall onto the ground. Patel, a BJP leader from Diu during an argument kicked the woman from Daman Municipal Council twice. Although she retaliated with force, the man again pushed her. The incident happened in Daman during a a furious verbal argument between Naveen Patel and Simple Katela. The corporator then hit him but she was again pushed down. The incident was caught on CCTV camera in the room. Other BJP members in the room are seen trying to stop the commotion, but the duo does not fails to listen to them. (Also Read: BJP MLAâ€™s aide thrashes two youngsters with hockey stick after stripping them) According to a ABP live Report, BJP members are seen trying to stop the duo, but they fall a deaf ear to them. After the leader pushed them, the belongings of the women including her phone and some other things fell to the floor. BJP members around are seen trying to pacify both of them. Reportedly said that the fight took place at a hotel lobby where the political party held a meeting on organizational changes. Katela later lodged a police complaint against Patel. The altercation took place on Tuesday in the presence of BJP party office-bearers and members of civic organisations. 
  5:10 PM Topics:
